data.title: Enroll
data.meta_description: The Official Lawrence Public Schools Website to get information about Lawrence Public Schools.
data.text:
Step 1

2024-25 School Year

This link is to enroll PK-12 students for Lawrence Public Schools for the school year of 2024-25 beginning this fall.

Please note: If your student is currently enrolled in LPS and is returning for next school year, you DO NOT need to register again.

New PK-12 Students Register

Step 3B

For Students in Grades K-8 to Finish Registration

Please Call 978-975-5900 to Schedule a Virtual Appointment:

Lawrence Public Schools Family Resource Center

237 Essex Street. 4th Floor

Lawrence, MA 01840

Phone 978-975-5900

Fax 978-722-8551

All registrations are done remotely or in-person by appointment.

Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday

9:00AM to 2:00PM

Thursday only during the month of August

12:00PM to 6:30PM

For Those Returning Missing Documents:

Call the 978-975-5900

Check out how to scan documents for enrollment for help making digital copies to send in.
